goals__remit:
Promoting, defending and representing the interest of the chewing gum and gum base industry worldwide, the Association shall: 
(a) Protect and promote the trade and welfare of the Industry with due regard for the public interest; 
(b) Foster, promote and defend the common business interests of its Members by facilitating proper 
and lawful consideration and exchange of information upon common questions affecting the Industry; 
(c) Represent the Industry worldwide in all relevant forums, to identify relevant local, regional and 
global issues for that Industry and to co-ordinate appropriate responses and their submission to the 
competent audience; and 
(d) Do all such acts and things necessary to promote the general welfare of the Industry and for the 
accomplishment of the objects hereinabove set forth or which shall be recognized as proper objectives 
of a trade association, including but not limited to: 
(1) editing and diffusion of newsletters and other publications, 
(2) organizing conferences and seminars, carrying out studies and research projects; 
(3) representing the Industry towards government bodies, national and international institutions and organizations, and other stakeholders, 
(4) communicating the Association’s views through the media, and 
(5) participating in the activities of other non-profit organizations.
